ChunkText: passport your passport allows you to travel outside of your country, as well as return home again. please keep your passport in a safe place, and do not carry your passport with you in the us. ies recommends carrying a photocopy of your passport with you. your passport should never be allowed to expire.
ContextAfter: when your passport is within 6 months of expiring, you can work with your countrys embassy in the US to apply for a new passport, typically through your embassys website.
